meanings.definition: Occurring after the launch of a product or service.
meanings.sent1: The postlaunch analysis showed positive customer feedback.
meanings.sent2: The company's postlaunch strategy focused on customer retention.
meanings.sent3: The postlaunch celebration was filled with excitement and joy.
meanings.sent4: The postlaunch period felt like a new beginning for the team.
meanings.sent5: The postlaunch phase marked the start of increased sales.

meanings.definition: To release or introduce something after it has been launched.
meanings.sent1: They decided to postlaunch the updated version of the app next month.
meanings.sent2: The company plans to postlaunch their new product line in the fall.
meanings.sent3: He wanted to postlaunch the surprise announcement during the event.
meanings.sent4: She will postlaunch the marketing campaign once the initial phase is complete.
meanings.sent5: The team will postlaunch the new feature after gathering user feedback.
